Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

Just finished a cinematic based on the soviet Venera mission. I know there are a ton of innacuracies but I was wondering what people thought.

Check it out

you can embed videos. look!

just copy and paste the URL into the box that openswhen you click the little insert video button on the bar where you post

It's pretty good. But use of the Sagan series in cinematics has become a little over-saturated, and if you have to use it then don't bring it in right at the beginning; Save it for when the time is right. To improve you should use a little more kerbcam, maintain a bit more quality control with the audio and music, and spend some more time framing your shots. Other than that, it's all very promising

EDIT: In future you should also post your work here. I could do with some more posts on that thread.

Thanks for the feedback!

I was actually a little worried about tons of people already using sagan's speech, but a quick search didnt show any so I went ahead with it. Im sure it is used a lot though!

For the kerbcam, in the 0.24 save which I started filming in, it was repeatedly crashing my game, so I removed it and filmed a big chunk of the cinematic without it. I realized later that downgrading to 0.235 fixed the crashes but didn't want to redo all of the shots, but I know that for next time.

Thanks!
